sentences.en: An awful lot of people (=  a large number of people  ) died in the war.
sentences.cn: 很多很多的人在这场战争中死去。

sentences.en: Between you and me, though, it's been awful for business.
sentences.cn: 不过你我之间说说，这事儿办得真不怎么样。

sentences.en: Even if the weather's awful there's lots to do.
sentences.cn: 即使天气很差，也还有好多事情可做。

sentences.en: He is a pretty awful driver.
sentences.cn: 他开车水平相当糟糕。

sentences.en: He made me feel an awful fool.
sentences.cn: 他让我感觉像个大傻瓜。

sentences.en: Her injuries were massive. It was awful.
sentences.cn: 她遍体鳞伤。太可怕了。

sentences.en: I don't know how often I heard the same awful jokes.
sentences.cn: 这种千篇一律的烂笑话我不知道听过多少回了。

sentences.en: I just had the most awful dream.
sentences.cn: 我刚做了个非常可怕的梦。

sentences.en: I looked awful and felt quite shaky.
sentences.cn: 我貌似生病了，觉得很虚弱。

sentences.en: I’m sure Suzy is dead but the awful thing is not knowing how it happened.
sentences.cn: 我肯定苏齐是死了，但不幸的是不知道是怎么一回事。

sentences.en: I've got an awful lot of work to do.
sentences.cn: 我有一大堆事情要做。

sentences.en: I’ve stopped believing most of what he says. Isn’t that awful?
sentences.cn: 他说的大部分话我都不再相信了。很糟吧？

sentences.en: It looked as though the storm had an awful lot of force.
sentences.cn: 看上去暴风雨来势汹汹。

sentences.en: Jeans look awful on me.
sentences.cn: 我穿牛仔裤难看极了。

sentences.en: Some of their offences are so awful they would chill the blood.
sentences.cn: 他们的一些罪行骇人听闻，简直令人毛骨悚然。

sentences.en: That fridge smells awful.
sentences.cn: 那台冰箱气味难闻极了。

sentences.en: The helicopter turned at an awful angle before righting itself.
sentences.cn: 直升机在恢复平稳之前倾斜得很厉害。

sentences.en: The last six months have been awful for her.
sentences.cn: 最近六个月对她来说相当难过。

sentences.en: The weather was awful.
sentences.cn: 天气很糟糕。

sentences.en: These guys talk an awful load of old cobblers.
sentences.cn: 这些人纯粹是胡说八道。

sentences.en: This is the most awful evening I can ever remember.
sentences.cn: 这是我记忆中最可怕的一晚。

sentences.en: We met and I thought he was awful.
sentences.cn: 我们见了面，我觉得他很讨人厌。

sentences.en: we've had an awful lot of letters.
sentences.cn: 我们有很多信。

sentences.en: You know, 10 years sounds like an awful long time.
sentences.cn: 你知道，10年听起来遥遥无期。

sentences.en: you've still got an awful lot to learn.
sentences.cn: 你还有很多东西要学。

phrases.tran_cn: 气候恶劣；非常糟糕的天气

trans.tran_cn: 令人讨厌的，可怕的，不舒服的，非常的，（量）极多的
trans.tran_en: making you feel great respect or fear
